About.title: About Simple Portfolio App
About.subtitle: A production-grade portfolio management application
About.description: <bold>Simple Portfolio App</bold> is a financial portfolio management system that allows you to create and manage investment portfolios, track assets (stocks, crypto, etc.), and monitor your investment performance.
About.feature_responsive: Responsive design for mobile and desktop
About.opensource_desc: This project is open source under the MIT License. Check out the source code and contribute on GitHub.
About.author_desc: Full-stack developer passionate about building production-grade applications.
